text:
My thesis on $META has been that they are on track to become one of the largest AI compute platforms in the world built on top of the most engaged network ever created.

I have been vocal that at some point Zuck would realize that the marginal return on another dollar invested in VR/AR is nowhere near the return on a dollar invested in AI training, inference & the compute infrastructure arms race that is defining the next decade of competition. 

Today‚Äôs shift confirms that recognition & removes the biggest capital-allocation overhang on the stock.

I added more shares today.

$META just gained ~$100B in market cap on a move that saves them ~$5B a year.

Well played Zuck.
$META ZUCKERBERG IS PREPARING TO CUT METAVERSE SPENDING BY AS MUCH AS 30%
$NVDA CEO Jensen Huang predicts 90% of the world's knowledge will be AI-generated within 2-3 years  üò≥

$NVDA CEO Jensen Huang says he is super excited about the $TSLA robots Elon Musk is building.

He called Musk‚Äôs robotics work one of the most important frontiers in AI.
$HIMS OFFICIALLY ENTERING CANADA AS ITS NEXT MAJOR INTERNATIONAL MARKET

$AMZN plans to pull most parcels from USPS & route them through its own network by late 2026

It reinforces one of the biggest moats on the planet since every step Amazon internalizes makes the logistics flywheel spin faster & makes the gap nearly impossible for rivals to close

$PLTR launched Chain Reaction with $NVDA as an AI infra platform that unifies utilities, data centers & developers to forecast power demand as AI loads accelerate.

AI doesn‚Äôt scale without a coordination layer for power & Palantir is making it clear they plan to own that layer.

Go open your $HOOD app and look up $IREN.

You'll see exactly why the stock is moving & you'll also see me on the opposite side of Jim Cramer on this one.

Santa rally looks like it might have already started with today‚Äôs growth moves:

Jensen is making it clear that $NVDA is a platform because every major AI workflow (model training, fine-tuning, inference, simulation, robotics, digital twins) is already built around Nvidia‚Äôs APIs & libraries

The switching costs are enormous.

$SYM Symbotic said it has begun an underwritten public offering of 10M Class A shares, including 6.5M offered by the company. The company plans to grant underwriters a 30-day option to buy up to 1.5 million additional shares.
$PATH UiPath shares surged more than 10% in extended trading on Wednesday after the software company reported Q3 results and guidance that topped Wall Street's forecast.

$FIVE Five Below  reported FQ3 sales rose 23.3% year-over-year to $1.04 billion. Comparable sales were up 14.3% during the quarter. Operating income was $43.3 million compared to an operating loss of $0.6 million a year ago.

Natural gas in Europe follows a predictable pattern.

In the summer months, they fill their storage facilities to use primarily for winter space heating.  The gray area shows the range from 2010 to 2024 (excluding the COVID-related distortions in 2021). The blue line is natural gas in storage in 2025.

Europe is running very low inventories. They'd better hope for a mild winter, or heating bills are going parabolic, especially without access to cheap Russian gas.

Russian Gas flows to Europe were already down 85% from the peak. 
Not hard to get rid of the last 15%.

I believe the greatest risk is not that of an AI bubble or other speculative fears circling Nvidia $NVDA, but rather that investors miss out on what may be one of the strongest investing opportunities of our lifetime.

I break down what this opportunity is in this week‚Äôs newsletter ‚Äì link in bio.
